"); } $('#printable3').hide(); $('#printable4').hide(); //start creating a PDF for the report var doc = new jsPDF('p','pt','letter'); var page1 = $('#data1')[0]; var gdspNum = $('#printable3')[0]; var imgData = 'data:image/jpeg;base64,'; doc.addImage(imgData, 'jpeg', 40, 20, 450, 45); doc.setFontSize(12); var specialElementHandlers = { '#editor': function(element, renderer){ return true; } }; doc.fromHTML(gdspNum, 40, 70, { 'width': 450, 'elementHandlers': specialElementHandlers }); var projName = $('#pName').val(); var vGap = 0; var sub1 = " "; var sub2 = " "; addTableToPdf(doc, document.getElementById("data1"), 100); if(projName.length > 65){ vGap = 20; var bPoint = findBreakPoint(projName); if(bPoint == '-'){ sub1 = projName.substring(0, 65) + '-'; sub2 = projName.substring(65); }else{ sub1 = projName.substring(0, bPoint); sub2 = projName.substring(bPoint); } $('#projectName15').html(sub1); $('#extra').html(sub2); addTableToPdf(doc, document.getElementById("data25"), 210); }else{ addTableToPdf(doc, document.getElementById("data2"), 210); } addTableToPdf(doc, document.getElementById("data3"), 345 + vGap); setCheckMark(doc, 'page1', vGap) doc.addPage(); addTableToPdf(doc, document.getElementById("data4"), 45 + vGap); setCheckMark(doc, 'page2', vGap) doc.addPage(); addTableToPdf(doc, document.getElementById("data6"), 45); addTableToPdf(doc, document.getElementById("data7"), 350); setCheckMark(doc, 'page3', vGap); if(comment_str.length > 137){ doc.addPage(); doc.text(40, 45, 'Approval Status'); addTableToPdf1(doc, document.getElementById("data8"), 55); } doc.save('Report_' + c.data.tasks.gdsp_id + '.pdf'); function findBreakPoint(str){ var retVal = 0; var char1 = str.charAt(65); var substr = str.substring(0,65); if(char1 == ' '){ return 65; }else{ var count = 0; for(count = 65; count > 57; count--){ var ch = substr.charAt(count); if(ch == ' '){ retVal = count; break; } } if(retVal == 0){ return '-'; }else{ return retVal; } } } function getImage(){ var imgData = 'data:image/png;base64,'; return imgData; } function setCheckMark(doc, page, vGap){ var data = c.data.tasks.variables; for(key in data){ if(textFields.indexOf(key) < 0 && data[key] == 'true' ){ if(page == 'page1'){ locateMarkPage1(doc, key, vGap); }else if(page == 'page2'){ locateMarkPage2(doc, key); }else if(page == 'page3'){ locateMarkPage3(doc, key); } } } } function locateMarkPage1(doc, name, vGap){ if(name == 'prospective'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 295 + vGap, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'restrospective'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 315 + vGap, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'human'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 371 + vGap, 15, 15); }else if( name == 'rat'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 391 + vGap, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'mouse'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 411 + vGap, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'celegans'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 431 + vGap, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'drosophila'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 451 + vGap, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'yeast'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 471 + vGap, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'bacteria'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 491 + vGap, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'nonHuman'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 511 + vGap, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'germLine'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 531 + vGap, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'dnaType'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 551 + vGap, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'rnaType'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 571 + vGap, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'microbiome'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 591 + vGap, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'mitochrondria'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 611 + vGap, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'otherType'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 631 + vGap, 15, 15); } } function locateMarkPage2(doc, name){ if(name == 'snpArrayData'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 70, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'expressionArray'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 90 , 15, 15); }else if(name == 'methylationArray'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 110, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'arrayDerive'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 130, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'microarrayData'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 150, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'sequenceData'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 170, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'somaticSnv'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 190, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'arrayCgh'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 210, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'wholeGenome'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 230, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'wholeExome'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 250, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'targetGenome'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 270, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'targetExome'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 290, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'wholeTranscriptome'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 310, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'targetTrabscriptome'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 330, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'epigenomicMark'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 350, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'sanger'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 370, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'rrna'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 390, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'association'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 410, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'arrayDerivedExpression'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 430, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'rnaExpression'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 450, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'derivedMethylation'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 470, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'otherAnalysis'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 490, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'individual'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 510, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'aggregate'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 530, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'notApplicableDataForm'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 550, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'arrayExpress'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 570, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'cancerGenomics'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 590, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'clinVar'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 610, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'dbGap'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 630, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'dbSnp'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 650, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'dbVar'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 670, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'ena'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 690, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'geo'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 710, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'mgi'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 730, 15, 15); } /*else */ } function locateMarkPage3(doc, name){ if(name == 'genBank'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 70, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'traceArchive'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 90, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'wormbase'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 110, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'sra'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 130, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'zfin'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 150, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'OtherRepository'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 170, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'phenotype'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 190, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'exposure'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 210, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'clinicalData'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 230, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'protocol'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 250, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'instrument'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 270, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'surveyTool'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 290, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'otherCompanion'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 310, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'dataCheck'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 375, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'publication'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 395, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'otherSubmission'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 415, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'noHumanData'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 435, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'noLimitation'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 455, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'limitedOnly'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 475, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'limitedPurpose'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 495, 15, 15); }else if(name == 'relateToDisease'){ doc.addImage(getImage(), 'jpeg', 270, 535, 15, 15); } } function addTableToPdf(doc, data, height){ var res = doc.autoTableHtmlToJson(data); doc.autoTable(res.columns, res.data, {startX:60, startY: height, headerStyles:{fillColor: [204, 204, 204], textColor: [0, 0, 25]}, styles:{overflow: 'visible'}, columnStyles: { 0: {columnWidth: 250}, 1: {columnWidth: 280}}}); } function addTableToPdf1(doc, data, height){ console.log(data); var res = doc.autoTableHtmlToJson(data); doc.autoTable(res.columns, res.data, {startX:60, startY: height, headerStyles:{fillColor: [204, 204, 204], textColor: [0, 0, 25]}, styles:{overflow: 'linebreak', columnWidth: 'wrap'}, columnStyles: { 0: {columnWidth: 50}, 1: {columnWidth: 100}, 2: {columnWidth: 60}, 3: {columnWidth: 250}, 4: {columnWidth: 70}}}); } function parse(allcomments) { var comments = allcomments.split("ENDCOMMENTS"); var commentsblock = 'RoleApproverApproval StatusCommentsTime' for(i = 0; i < comments .length; i++){ if (comments[i].length > 40) { if (comments[i][0] == '\n') { var lastI = 0; while (lastI < comments[i].length && comments[i][lastI] == '\n') lastI ++; comments[i] = comments[i].substring(lastI,comments[i].length); } var t = comments[i].substring(0,22); t = t.replace(/([\\n])/g, ''); var approver = comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(ENDROLE)')+9,comments[i].length); var results = comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(Additional comments)') + 59,comments[i].indexOf('(Additional comments)') + 67); var comm= comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(Additional comments)') + 68, comments[i].indexOf('(role)')); var role = comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(role)') + 6, comments[i].indexOf('(ENDROLE)')); commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + "" + role + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + "" + approver + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + "" + results+ ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + "" + comm + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + "" + t + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; } } return commentsblock; } function loadApprovalData(data){ for(key in data){ var value = getValue(key, data[key]); $('#'+key+"2").html(value); $('#'+key+"1").html(value); } } function getValue(name, value){ if(textFields.indexOf(name) != -1 ){ if(name == 'date'){ return getConvertedValue(value, '1'); }else{ return value; } }else{ if(value == "true"){ return ''; }else{ return ''; } } } function getConvertedValue(value, flag){ if(flag == '0'){ var values = value.split('/'); return values[0]+'-'+values[1] + '-' + values[2]; }else { var values = value.split('-'); return values[0]+'/'+values[1] + '/' + values[2]; } } }]]>csp_instanceThis is the report page for GDSP applicationfalsegdps-report-page-contentfalseGDSP Report Page Contentfalsefalsesp_widgetzhoujim@nih.gov2017-04-20 15:26:26true01160574db12720054d8ff621f96192a199GDSP Report Page Contentglobalfalseglobalsp_widget_01160574db12720054d8ff621f96192azhoujim@nih.gov2017-05-01 21:54:11

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="DELETE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getCatItem</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var jsonArr = [];
	var name = request.queryParams.name;
	
	var gr_cat_items = new GlideRecord('sc_cat_item');
        gr_cat_items.addQuery('short_description', name);
        gr_cat_items.query();
		gr_cat_items.next();
 	var data = gr_cat_items.getValue('sys_id');
	
	jsonArr.push({
			id: data
	});
	
   return jsonArr;

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/gdspapi/getCatItem</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getCatItem</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-13 21:04:34</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>1d70dea6db8aba00f59974131f9619d0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getCatItem</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_1d70dea6db8aba00f59974131f9619d0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-13 21:04:34</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gdspAPI">212601dedb4e7a00f59974131f961986</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_cab0852edb86ba00f59974131f9619fe
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>fetchSavedRequestData</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var jsonData = [];
	var body = request.body.data;
	var requestedId =  body.requested_id;
   
	var gr_requested_item = new GlideRecord('u_gdsp_user_submission');
	gr_requested_item.addQuery('sys_id', requestedId );
	gr_requested_item.query();
	gr_requested_item.next();
	var value = gr_requested_item.u_value;
	var comments =  gr_requested_item.u_comments.getJournalEntry(-1);
    jsonData.push({
		value: value, 
		comments: comments
	});
	return jsonData;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/gdspapi/fetchSavedRequestData</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/fetchSavedRequestData</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-13 15:22:12</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>cab0852edb86ba00f59974131f9619fe</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>fetchSavedRequestData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_cab0852edb86ba00f59974131f9619fe</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-13 15:42:52</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gdspAPI">212601dedb4e7a00f59974131f961986</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_d5c0724edb12360054d8ff621f96193b
sys_update_xml.payload: RoleApproverApproval StatusCommentsTime' for(i = 0; i < comments .length; i++){ if (comments[i].length > 40) { if (comments[i][0] == '\n') { var lastI = 0; while (lastI < comments[i].length && comments[i][lastI] == '\n') lastI ++; comments[i] = comments[i].substring(lastI,comments[i].length); } var t = comments[i].substring(0,22); var approver = comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(ENDROLE)')+9,comments[i].length); var results = comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(Additional comments)') + 57,comments[i].indexOf('(Additional comments)') + 65); var comm= comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(Additional comments)') + 66, comments[i].indexOf('(role)')); var role = comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(role)') + 6, comments[i].indexOf('(ENDROLE)')); commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + "" + role + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + "" + approver + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + "" + results+ ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + "" + comm + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + "" + t + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; } } commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; return commentsblock; } function loadSubmittedData(data){ for(key in data){ var value = getValue(key, data[key]); $('#'+key+"1").html(value); } } function loadResubmittedData(data){ for(key in data){ setResubmitValue(key, data[key]); } } function getValue(name, value){ if(textFields.indexOf(name) != -1 ){ if(name == 'date'){ return getConvertedValue(value, '1'); }else{ return value; } }else{ if(value == "true"){ return ''; }else{ return ''; } return value; } } function setResubmitValue(name, value){ if(textFields.indexOf(name) != -1 ){ if(name == 'date'){ $('#'+name).val(getConvertedValue(value, '1')); }else{ $('#'+name).val(value); } }else{ if(value == "true"){ $('#'+name).prop('checked', true); }else{ $('#'+name).prop('checked', false); } } } function getConvertedValue(value, flag){ if(flag == '0'){ var values = value.split('/'); return values[0]+'-'+values[1] + '-' + values[2]; }else { var values = value.split('-'); return values[0]+'/'+values[1] + '/' + values[2]; } } function resetRequestValue(){ var i = 0; for( i = 0; i!= names.length; i++){ if(textFields.indexOf(names[i]) != -1 ){ $('#'+names[i]).val(''); }else{ $('#'+names[i] +"1").html(''); $('#'+names[i]).prop('checked', false); $('#'+names[i]).removeAttr("disabled"); } } $('#withdrawCommentsId').val(''); $('#withdrawSubmitId').val(''); $('#saved_id').val(''); } spUtil.recordWatch($scope, "sc_req_item", "", function(name, data) { spUtil.update($scope); }); }]]>csp_instancefalsegdsp-submitted-tablefalseGDSP Submitted Tablefalsefalsesp_widgetzhoujim@nih.gov2017-04-24 20:25:19trued5c0724edb12360054d8ff621f96193b177GDSP Submitted Tableglobalfalseglobalsp_widget_d5c0724edb12360054d8ff621f96193bzhoujim@nih.gov2017-05-16 16:18:48

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_ec5681dedb4e7a00f59974131f961950
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>saveRequestData</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	  var jsonData = [];
	  var variables = {};
	  var body = request.body.data; 
	  var action = body.action;
	  var requested_for = body.requested_for;
	  var value = body.value;
	  var project_name = body.project_name;
	  var saved_id = body.saved_id;
	  var answers_sys_id = '';
	  var save_submission = '';
	  if (action != null && action == 'DELETE') {
		  if (saved_id != '') {
			save_submission = new GlideRecord('u_gdsp_user_submission');
			save_submission.addQuery('sys_id',saved_id);
			save_submission.query();
			save_submission.next();
			answers_sys_id = save_submission.deleteRecord();
		  }
	  }else {
		  if (saved_id=='') {
			save_submission = new GlideRecord('u_gdsp_user_submission');
			save_submission.initialize();
			save_submission.u_value = value;
			save_submission.u_userid = requested_for; 
			save_submission.u_project_name = project_name; 
			var comments = body.comments;
			save_submission.u_comments = comments;
			answers_sys_id = save_submission.insert();
		  }else {
			save_submission = new GlideRecord('u_gdsp_user_submission');
			save_submission.addQuery('sys_id',saved_id);
			save_submission.query();
			save_submission.next();

			save_submission.u_value = value;
			save_submission.u_userid = requested_for; 
			save_submission.u_project_name = project_name; 
			answers_sys_id = save_submission.update();
		  }
	  }
	  jsonData.push({
	  	projectName: project_name,
		value : saved_id,
		action: action
	  });
	  return jsonData;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/gdspapi/saveRequestData</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/saveRequestData</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-12 21:04:08</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>ec5681dedb4e7a00f59974131f961950</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>saveRequestData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_ec5681dedb4e7a00f59974131f961950</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-13 15:08:54</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gdspAPI">212601dedb4e7a00f59974131f961986</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_4815a700db9abe0054d8ff621f9619c5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>fetchSubmittedRequestData</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var jsonArr = {}; 
	
	var requestedId = request.body.data.requestedid;
    var items = {};
	
	var gr_requested_item = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
	gr_requested_item.addQuery('sys_id',requestedId );
	gr_requested_item.query();
	gr_requested_item.next();
	var variables = gr_requested_item.variables;
	for (key in variables) {
		items[variables[key].getGlideObject().getQuestion().getName()] = variables[key].getDisplayValue();
	}
	var comments = '';

	/*var gr_approval_item = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_approver');
	var req_item = gr_approval_item.addJoinQuery('sc_req_item','document_id','sys_id');
	req_item.addCondition('sys_id',requestedId);
	var statevar = gr_approval_item.addQuery('state','approved');
	statevar.addOrCondition('state','rejected');
	statevar.addOrCondition('state','requested');
	gr_approval_item.orderBy('sys_updated_on');
	gr_approval_item.query();
	//var test=gr_approval_item.getRowCount();*/
	comments =  gr_requested_item.comments.getJournalEntry(-1);
  
	jsonArr.variables = items;
	jsonArr.comments = comments;
	
	return jsonArr;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/gdspapi/fetchSubmittedRequestData</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/fetchSubmittedRequestData</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-18 19:11:30</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>4815a700db9abe0054d8ff621f9619c5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>fetchSubmittedRequestData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_4815a700db9abe0054d8ff621f9619c5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-25 14:30:50</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gdspAPI">212601dedb4e7a00f59974131f961986</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_16e846e2db8aba00f59974131f9619b7
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>submitRequest</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var names=['investigator','email','phone', 'date', 'projectNumber', 'projectName', 'simpleSize','prospective', 'restrospective', 'human', 'nonHuman', 'germLine','somatic', 'dnaType', 'rnaType',  'microbiome', 'mitochrondria', 'otherType', 'specifyOtherType', 'snpArrayData', 'numSNP', 'expressionArray', 'numExpression','methylationArray', 'numMethylation','arrayDerive', 'microarrayData', 'sequenceData', 'somaticSnv', 'arrayCgh', 'wholeGenome', 'wholeExome', 'targetGenome', 'targetExome', 'wholeTranscriptome', 'targetTrabscriptome', 'epigenomicMark', 'sanger', 'rrna', 'association', 'arrayDerivedExpression', 'rnaExpression', 'derivedMethylation', 'otherAnalysis', 'spcifiedOtherAnalysis', 'individual', 'aggregate', 'notApplicableDataForm', 'arrayExpress', 'cancerGenomics', 'clinVar', 'dbGap', 'dbSnp', 'dbVar', 'ena', 'genBank', 'geo', 'mgi', 'sra', 'traceArchive', 'wormbase', 'zfin', 'OtherRepository', 'specifiedRepository','phenotype', 'exposure', 'clinicalData', 'specifiedClinicalData', 'protocol', 'specifiedProtocol', 'instrument', 'specifiedInstrument', 'surveyTool', 'otherCompanion', 'specifiedCompanion', 'dataCheck', 'publication', 'otherSubmission', 'psecifiedOtherSubmission', 'noHumanData', 'noLimitation','limitedOnly', 'limitedPurpose','relateToDisease','orginId', 'version','rat', 'mouse', 'celegans', 'drosophila', 'yeast', 'yeastSpecies', 'bacteria', 'bacteriaSpecies','noHumanOther'];

	var jsonData = [];
	var data = request.body.data;
	var requested_for = data.requested_for;
	var opened_by = data.opened_by;
	var cat_item = data.cat_item;
	var short_description = data.short_description;
	var itemIds = data.variables;
	var contactType = data.contact_type;
	var investigator= data.investigator;
	var projectName= data.projectName;
	var resubmit = data.resubmit;
	var comments = data.comments;

	var gr_request = new GlideRecord('sc_request');
	gr_request.initialize();
	gr_request.u_cms_submitted = true;
	gr_request.requested_for = requested_for;
	gr_request.opened_by = opened_by;
	gr_request.contact_type = contactType;
	var request_id = gr_request.insert();

	var gr_requested_item = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
	gr_requested_item.initialize();
	gr_requested_item.u_cms_submitted = true;
	gr_requested_item.cat_item = cat_item;
	gr_requested_item.short_description = short_description;
	gr_requested_item.request = request_id;
	gr_requested_item.contact_type = contactType;
	gr_requested_item.u_investigator = investigator;
	gr_requested_item.u_project_name = projectName;

	if(resubmit == 'true'){
		gr_requested_item.comments = comments;
	  }

	var submitted_id = gr_requested_item.insert();
	var number = gr_requested_item.number;

	for (x=0; x<names.length; x++) {
		var gr_answers = new GlideRecord('sc_item_option');
		gr_answers.initialize();
		gr_answers.item_option_new = itemIds[names[x]];
		gr_answers.value = data[names[x]];
		gr_answers.order = x+1;
		var answers_sys_id = gr_answers.insert();

		var gr_m2m = new GlideRecord('sc_item_option_mtom');
		gr_m2m.initialize();
		gr_m2m.sc_item_option = answers_sys_id;
		gr_m2m.request_item = submitted_id;
		gr_m2m.insert();
	  }

	var gr_requested_item2 = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
	gr_requested_item2.get(submitted_id);
	var gdt = new GlideDateTime();
	gr_requested_item2.due_date = gdt.getDisplayValue();
	gr_requested_item2.update();
	
	jsonData.push({
		id: submitted_id,
		number: number
	});
	
	return jsonData;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/gdspapi/submitRequest</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/submitRequest</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-13 20:32:40</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>16e846e2db8aba00f59974131f9619b7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>submitRequest</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_16e846e2db8aba00f59974131f9619b7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-05-01 14:24:39</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gdspAPI">212601dedb4e7a00f59974131f961986</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_e48cbe49db52b200f59974131f96194f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>updateGDSPRequest</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	   var jsonObj = {};
	   var data = request.body.data;
       var request_id = data.requested_id;
       var sd_id = data.sd_id;
       var requestItem_id = data.requestedItem_id;

       var sri = new GlideRecord("sc_req_item");
       sri.addQuery("sys_id", requestItem_id);
       sri.query();
       sri.next();
  
       sri.u_director= sd_id;
       sri.update();

       var comments = data.approval_comment;
       var action= data.action;
       var role = data.role;

       var gr1 = new GlideRecord("sysapproval_approver");
       gr1.addQuery("sys_id", request_id);
       gr1.query();
       gr1.next();
       gr1.state=action;
       gr1.comments.setJournalEntry( '(' + action + ') ' +comments + '(role)' + role + '(ENDROLE)' + gs.getUser().getFirstName() + ' ' + gs.getUser().getLastName() + 'ENDCOMMENTS', "${jvar_my_sys_id}");
       gr1.update();
	   
	   jsonObj = {
		   status : 'successed'
	   };
	
	  return jsonObj;

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/gdspapi/updateGDSPRequest</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/updateGDSPRequest</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-21 18:42:17</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>e48cbe49db52b200f59974131f96194f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>updateGDSPRequest</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_e48cbe49db52b200f59974131f96194f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-21 18:49:38</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gdspAPI">212601dedb4e7a00f59974131f961986</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_0d37479adb9a360054d8ff621f961947
sys_update_xml.payload: RoleApproverApproval StatusCommentsTime' for(i = 0; i < comments .length; i++){ if (comments[i].length > 40) { if (comments[i][0] == '\n') { var lastI = 0; while (lastI < comments[i].length && comments[i][lastI] == '\n') lastI ++; comments[i] = comments[i].substring(lastI,comments[i].length); } var t = comments[i].substring(0,22); var approver = comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(ENDROLE)')+9,comments[i].length); var results = comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(Additional comments)') + 57,comments[i].indexOf('(Additional comments)') + 65); var comm= comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(Additional comments)') + 66, comments[i].indexOf('(role)')); var role = comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(role)') + 6, comments[i].indexOf('(ENDROLE)')); commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + "" + role + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + "" + approver + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + "" + results+ ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + "" + comm + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + "" + t + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; } } commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; return commentsblock; } function loadSubmittedData(data){ for(key in data){ var value = getValue(key, data[key]); $('#'+key+"1").html(value); } } function getValue(name, value){ if(textFields.indexOf(name) != -1 ){ if(name == 'date'){ return getConvertedValue(value, '1'); }else{ return value; } }else{ if(value == "true"){ return ''; }else{ return ''; } return value; } } function getConvertedValue(value, flag){ if(flag == '0'){ var values = value.split('/'); return values[0]+'-'+values[1] + '-' + values[2]; }else { var values = value.split('-'); return values[0]+'/'+values[1] + '/' + values[2]; } } function resetRequestValue(){ var i = 0; for( i = 0; i!= names.length; i++){ if(textFields.indexOf(names[i]) != -1 ){ $('#'+names[i] + "1").html(''); }else{ $('#'+names[i] +"1").html(''); $('#'+names[i] + "1").prop('checked', false); $('#'+names[i] + "1").removeAttr("disabled"); } } } spUtil.recordWatch($scope, "sc_req_item", "", function(name, data) { spUtil.update($scope); }); }]]>csp_instancefalsegdsp-pso-tablefalseGDSP PSO data tablefalsefalsesp_widgetzhoujim@nih.gov2017-04-25 16:41:57true0d37479adb9a360054d8ff621f96194736GDSP PSO data tableglobalfalseglobalsp_widget_0d37479adb9a360054d8ff621f961947zhoujim@nih.gov2017-05-16 16:17:23

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_3b2b127adb8efa0054d8ff621f9619c4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getGDSPVariableIdArray</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

	var names=['investigator','email','phone', 'date', 'projectNumber', 'projectName', 'simpleSize','prospective', 'restrospective', 'human', 'nonHuman', 'germLine','somatic', 'dnaType', 'rnaType',  'microbiome', 'mitochrondria', 'otherType', 'specifyOtherType', 'snpArrayData', 'numSNP', 'expressionArray', 'numExpression','methylationArray', 'numMethylation','arrayDerive', 'microarrayData', 'sequenceData', 'somaticSnv', 'arrayCgh', 'wholeGenome', 'wholeExome', 'targetGenome', 'targetExome', 'wholeTranscriptome', 'targetTrabscriptome', 'epigenomicMark', 'sanger', 'rrna', 'association', 'arrayDerivedExpression', 'rnaExpression', 'derivedMethylation', 'otherAnalysis', 'spcifiedOtherAnalysis', 'individual', 'aggregate', 'notApplicableDataForm', 'arrayExpress', 'cancerGenomics', 'clinVar', 'dbGap', 'dbSnp', 'dbVar', 'ena', 'genBank', 'geo', 'mgi', 'sra', 'traceArchive', 'wormbase', 'zfin', 'OtherRepository', 'specifiedRepository','phenotype', 'exposure', 'clinicalData', 'specifiedClinicalData', 'protocol', 'specifiedProtocol', 'instrument', 'specifiedInstrument', 'surveyTool', 'otherCompanion', 'specifiedCompanion', 'dataCheck', 'publication', 'otherSubmission', 'psecifiedOtherSubmission', 'noHumanData', 'noLimitation','limitedOnly', 'limitedPurpose','relateToDisease','orginId', 'version','rat', 'mouse', 'celegans', 'drosophila', 'yeast', 'yeastSpecies', 'bacteria', 'bacteriaSpecies','noHumanOther'];

    var variables={};
    var email = request.queryParams.email;
	var gr = new GlideRecord("question");
    gr.addQuery("sys_updated_by", email);
    gr.orderBy("order");
    gr.query();

	
	while(gr.next()){
	   var name =  gr.getValue('name');
	   for(var i = 0; i < names.length; i++){
		   if(name == names[i]){
				variables[name] = gr.getValue('sys_id');
				break;
		   }
	   }
	}
	var jsonArr = [];
	jsonArr.push({
		itemId: variables
	});
	
	return jsonArr;

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/gdspapi/getGDSPVariableIdArray</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getGDSPVariableIdArray</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-14 16:33:20</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>3b2b127adb8efa0054d8ff621f9619c4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getGDSPVariableIdArray</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_3b2b127adb8efa0054d8ff621f9619c4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-05-01 14:23:57</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gdspAPI">212601dedb4e7a00f59974131f961986</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getCatItem</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var jsonData =[];
	//var name = 'CCR Genomic Data Sharing Plan';
	var name = request.queryParams.name;
	var gr_cat_items = new GlideRecord('sc_cat_item');
		gr_cat_items.addQuery('short_description', name);
		gr_cat_items.query();
		gr_cat_items.next();
	var catId = gr_cat_items.getValue('sys_id');
	jsonData.push({
		cat_item_id: catId
	});
    return jsonData;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/gdspapi/getCatItem</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getCatItem</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-13 22:16:13</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>2040eea6dbcaba00f59974131f96192c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getCatItem</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_2040eea6dbcaba00f59974131f96192c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-13 22:22:11</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gdspAPI">212601dedb4e7a00f59974131f961986</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: content_block_programmatic_c8a7483d6fcd1600bbc002e6eb3ee407
sys_update_xml.payload:
truegeneralfalsefalseSoftware Solution GDSP Page
     

CCR Tools

CCR Genomic Data Sharing Project     Help
The Genomic Data Sharing (GDS) Policy applies to all NIH intramural research that generates large-scale human or non-human genomic data as well as the use of these data for subsequent research. Large-scale data include genome-wide association studies (GWAS), single nucleotide polymorphisms (SNP) arrays, and genome sequence, transcriptomic, metagenomic, epigenomic, and gene expression data. For details about what thresholds require data sharing please refer to the CCR GDS Website.
Investigators are required to develop a Genomic Data Sharing Plan if they are proposing research that will generate large-scale human and non-human genomic data for which the GDS policy applies. For clinical trials, investigator is considered the Principal Investigator or the Lead Associate Investigator. For laboratory based studies, investigator is considered the scientist leading the research.
    A Genomic Data Sharing Plan should be in place PRIOR to starting the research.

return false; } } return true; }else{ return false; } } function validateCompanion(){ if($('#phenotype').is(":checked") || $('#exposure').is(":checked") || $('#surveyTool').is(":checked") || $('#clinicalData').is(":checked") || $('#protocol').is(":checked") || $('#instrument').is(":checked") || $('#otherCompanion').is(":checked")){ if($('#clinicalData').is(":checked")){ if( $('#specifiedClinicalData').val().trim().length == 0){ $('#specifiedClinicalData').css("background-color", "yellow"); sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_e0bc379edb5e360054d8ff621f9619d3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>gsdspUtil</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	 var jsonArr = {};
	 var orgin_id = request.body.data.org_id;
	 var version = '1';
	 var ticket_num = request.body.data.ticket_number;
	 var ver = '';
	 var sys_id = '';
	 var method = request.body.data.method;

	 if (method == 'select'){
		 var gr_tracking = new GlideRecord('u_ccr_tracking_t');
		 gr_tracking.addQuery('u_orgid',orgin_id);
		 gr_tracking.query();
		 if(gr_tracking.getRowCount() > 0){
		   gr_tracking.next();
		   ver = gr_tracking.getValue('u_ticket_number'); 
		 }
	 }else if(method == 'withdraw'){
		  var id = request.body.data.id;
		  var gr = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
		  gr.addQuery('sys_id',id); //to delete one record
		  gr.query();
		  gr.next();
		  gr.deleteRecord();
	 }else{
		var gr_tracking1 = new GlideRecord('u_ccr_tracking_t');
		gr_tracking1.addQuery('u_orgid',orgin_id);
		gr_tracking1.query();
		if(gr_tracking1.getRowCount() > 0){
		   gr_tracking1.next();
		   ver = gr_tracking1.getValue('u_version');
		   sys_id = gr_tracking1.getValue('sys_id');
		   method = 'update';
		}else{
		   method = 'insert';
		}
		if(method == 'update'){
		   var gr_tracking2 = new GlideRecord('u_ccr_tracking_t');
		   gr_tracking2.get(sys_id); 
		   ver =  (parseInt(ver) + 1).toFixed(0);
		   gr_tracking2.u_version = ver;
		   gr_tracking2.update();
		}
		if(method == 'insert'){
		   var gr_tracking3 = new GlideRecord('u_ccr_tracking_t');
		   gr_tracking3.initialize();
		   gr_tracking3.u_orgid = orgin_id;
		   gr_tracking3.u_version = version;
		   gr_tracking3.u_ticket_number = ticket_num;
		   gr_tracking3.insert();
		   ver = version;
		}
	 }
	 jsonArr ={
		version: ver
	 };
	 return jsonArr;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/gdspapi/gsdspUtil</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/gsdspUtil</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-25 20:40:34</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>e0bc379edb5e360054d8ff621f9619d3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>gsdspUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_e0bc379edb5e360054d8ff621f9619d3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-26 19:22:08</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gdspAPI">212601dedb4e7a00f59974131f961986</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
